effect.diamond_pearl: Inflicts regular damage. Every time the user is hit after it uses this move but before its next action, its Attack raises by one stage.
effect.platinum: Inflicts regular damage. Every time the user is hit after it uses this move but before its next action, its Attack raises by one stage.
effect.heartgold_soulsilver: Inflicts regular damage. Every time the user is hit after it uses this move but before its next action, its Attack raises by one stage.

short_effect.diamond_pearl: If the user is hit after using this move, its Attack rises by one stage.
short_effect.platinum: If the user is hit after using this move, its Attack rises by one stage.
short_effect.heartgold_soulsilver: If the user is hit after using this move, its Attack rises by one stage.

flavor_text.diamond_pearl: While this move is in use, it gains attack power each time the user is hit in battle.
flavor_text.platinum: While this move is in use, it gains attack power each time the user is hit in battle.
flavor_text.heartgold_soulsilver: While this move is in use, it gains attack power each time the user is hit in battle.
